inclusion.criterion: Adult patients with generalized tonic-clonic, complex partial and/or simple partial seizures.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients on valproate monotherapy who are not seizure free at at the maximal dose they can tolerate.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients should be able to understand the patient information concerning the study and be able to give informed consent.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Absence seizures or juvenile myoclonic epilepsy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy, CHF, and depression. He was recently tapered off Dilantin and had no further events during the hospital course.
